name: Sling Shot 3D - Christmas Special
description:
Sling Target 3D is an Exiting game where user need to aim the target and hit it within limited chances. Game environment and the functionality will give you real play feel . All the 3 levels are designed in different ways . Each level will give you full length excitement .

Features :

This application is compatible for all iOS devices
Beautifully designed 3D environment
User need to hit maximum targets with in the given time to clear the level
Pleasant back ground and game play sounds
